text: The Prose Life of Alexander is a Middle English prose romance extant in a single copy, found in the mid-fifteenth century Lincoln Thornton Manuscript. It was edited by J.S. Westlake for the Early English Text Society.Brewer and Owen xiii, xxii. ==References== ;Notes ;Bibliography * * * * * Category:15th- century books Category:15th-century manuscripts Category:Middle English literature Category:15th century in England Category:Alexander Romance
title: Prose Life of Alexander
